thread.title: Kathy Scruggs
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Kathy Scruggs

author: Kathy Scruggs
title: Kathy Scruggs
text: Since I discovered Frames Direct, it is the only way we get our glasses. I think I have been getting my new glasses and prescription sun glasses here since 2009. I don't even bother to shop anyplace else. I get my prescriptions updated, and same for my husband, then we order from Frames Direct. It saves too much money to do anything else!!
